en: I met the prince himself.
I live in Yokohama.
I was born in Yokohama.
I was raised in Yokohama.
I walked straight ahead without looking to the side.
zh: 我目不斜视地一直往前走。

en: I was afraid of being put into a closet.
I was crowded out.
I waited for the answer but nobody answered.
zh: 我等了答案，但是没有人回答。

en: I was ushered into the drawing room.
I picked up a purse in the street.
zh: 我在街上捡到一个钱包。

en: I got a letter written with a pencil.
zh: 我收到一封用铅笔写的信。

en: I have not any pencils.
I don't have a pencil.
I don't have any pencils.
I lent my pencil to him.
zh: 我把我的铅笔借给他了。

en: I want a knife to sharpen my pencil with.
zh: 我想要一把刀来削铅笔。

en: I bought two dozen pencils.
I bought ten pencils, half of which were to be given to my brother.
zh: 我买了十支铅笔，其中一半要给我弟弟。

en: I caught sight of her figure in the distance.
zh: 我远远地瞥见了她的身影。

en: I saw flashes of lightning in the distance.
I have to commute all the way from a distant suburb.
zh: 我必须从遥远的郊区一路通勤。

en: I am forbidden tobacco.
I could not refrain from smoking.
I can't give up smoking.
I stopped smoking and drinking.
I quit smoking and drinking.
I have quit smoking and drinking.
I was unable to breathe because of the smoke.
zh: 我因为烟雾而无法呼吸。

en: I was choked by smoke.
I never make a speech without being nervous.
I made a draft of my speech.
I belong to the drama club.
I played an important part in the garden party.
zh: 我在花园派对上扮演了重要的角色。

en: I got off at the wrong station.
It took me ten minutes to walk to the station.
zh: 我走了十分钟才到车站。

en: I walked as far as the station.
I took a cab to the station.
We had to walk all the way to the station.
zh: 我们不得不一直走到车站。

en: I ran all the way to the station.
I met my teacher on the way to the station.
zh: 我在去车站的路上遇到了我的老师。

en: I hurried to the station only to miss the train.
zh: 我匆忙赶到车站，结果错过了火车。

en: I went to the station.
I'm just about to set off for the station.
I am near the station.
I met her in a coffee shop near the station.
zh: 我在车站附近的一家咖啡馆里遇到了她。

en: I met an old man near the station.
zh: 我在车站附近遇到了一个老人。

en: I will pick him up at the station.
I arrived at the station.
I bumped into him at the station.
zh: 我在车站偶然遇到了他。

en: I joined him at the station.
I had great difficulty in finding my ticket at the station.
zh: 我在车站很难找到我的票。

en: I heard my name called in the station.
zh: 我在车站听到有人叫我的名字。

en: I ran across my uncle at the station.
zh: 我在车站偶然遇到了我的叔叔。

en: I have often met Mr Sasaki at the station.
zh: 我经常在车站遇到佐佐木先生。

en: I walked from the station.
I am to meet her at five at the station.
zh: 我五点要在车站和她见面。

en: I want to live close to the station.
zh: 我想住在离车站近的地方。

en: I live about an hour from the station.
zh: 我住的地方离车站大约一个小时的路程。

en: I took a taxi from the station to the hotel.
I live within 200 meters of the station.
zh: 我住在离车站200米以内的地方。

en: I don't like a novel without a hero.
zh: 我不喜欢没有英雄的小说。

en: I don't like novels without heroes.
zh: 我不喜欢没有英雄的小说。

en: I like English Breakfast tea the best.
I can't help feeling affection for the English countryside.
zh: 我忍不住对英国乡村产生好感。

en: I'm fed up with English.
I can speak English.
I want to be able to speak English.
I cannot speak English, much less German.
zh: 我不会说英语，更不用说德语了。

en: I am good at speaking English.
I study English an hour every day.
zh: 我每天学习一小时英语。

en: I like to study English.
I am going to study English.
I study English.
I want to study English.
I can read English, but I can't speak it.
zh: 我能读英语，但是我说不出来。

en: It is six years since I started to study English.
zh: 我开始学英语已经六年了。

en: It's been six years since I started to study English.
zh: 我开始学英语已经六年了。

en: I can teach English.
I teach English.
I must brush up my English.
I want to brush up my English.
I bought an English book, but the book was hard to understand.
zh: 我买了一本英文书，但是这本书很难懂。

en: I have a few English books.
I have some English books.
I have few English books.
I have hardly any English books.
zh: 我几乎没有任何英文书。

en: I have very few books in English.
zh: 我几乎没有几本英文书。

en: I like English better.
I study French in addition to English.
I intend to devote a few hours a day to the study of English.
zh: 我打算每天花几个小时学习英语。

en: I like studying English.
I would like to improve my English pronunciation.
zh: 我想提高我的英语发音。

en: I really look up to my English teacher, Mr Taniguchi.
zh: 我真的很尊敬我的英语老师，谷口老师。

en: I respect my English teacher, Mr. Taniguchi.
zh: 我尊敬我的英语老师，谷口老师。

en: I don't do much study ahead for the English classes.
I don't spend much time preparing for English classes.
zh: 我不太花时间准备英语课。

en: I know how to write a letter in English.
zh: 我知道怎么用英语写信。

en: I didn't let on to my parents that I got a C on the English test.
zh: 我没有向我父母透露我英语考试得了C。

en: I'm at ease in English.
I'm comfortable in English.
I'm at home in English.
I am interested in English.
I want to study German in addition to English.
zh: 除了英语，我还想学习德语。

en: I would like to brush up my English.
zh: 我想提高我的英语水平。

en: I'm sick of English.
I like English and music.
I could make myself understood in English.
zh: 我可以用英语表达自己的意思。

en: I could not make myself understood in English.
zh: 我无法用英语表达自己的意思。

en: I found it impossible to beat him at English.
zh: 我发现不可能在英语上打败他。

en: I keep a diary in English.
I wrote to my teacher in English.
zh: 我用英语给我的老师写信。

en: I bought a newspaper written in English.
zh: 我买了一份用英语写的报纸。

en: I received a letter written in English.
zh: 我收到了一封用英语写的信。

en: I finished writing a letter in English.
zh: 我用英语写完了一封信。

en: I wrote a letter in English.
I found it difficult to make myself understood in English.
zh: 我发现很难用英语表达自己的意思。

en: I can't make myself understood in English.
zh: 我无法用英语表达自己的意思。

en: I delivered a lecture in English.
zh: 我用英语做了一个讲座。

en: I was called upon to make a speech in English.
zh: 我被要求用英语发表演讲。

en: I got a good grade in English.
I'm afraid I won't be able to make myself understand in English.
zh: 恐怕我无法用英语表达自己的意思。

en: I'm afraid I cannot make myself understood in English.
zh: 恐怕我不能用英语表达自己的意思。

en: I think that maybe I won't be able to make myself understood in English.
zh: 我想我可能无法用英语表达自己的意思。

en: I couldn't make myself understood well in English.
zh: 我无法用英语很好地表达自己的意思。

en: I can't speak English, much less German.
zh: 我不会说英语，更不用说德语了。

en: I was poor at English.
I am able to read English.
I can read English.
I like English very much.
I don't like English.
I like English, but I cannot speak well.
zh: 我喜欢英语，但是我说不好。

en: I don't understand English.
I can't even speak English very well, much less Spanish.
zh: 我英语都说不好，更别说西班牙语了。

en: I'm able to swim.
I can swim.
I would rather play tennis than swim.
zh: 我宁愿打网球也不愿游泳。

en: I'd rather play tennis than swim.
zh: 我宁愿打网球也不愿游泳。

en: I like swimming very much.
I am interested in swimming.
I like to swim.
I don't know how to swim.
I know how to swim.
I want to learn how to swim.
I know how to swim, but I don't like swimming in the river.
zh: 我会游泳，但是我不喜欢在河里游泳。

en: I want to live forever.
I have given up smoking for good and all.
I will quit smoking for good.
I haven't heard from him for a long time.
zh: 我很久没有收到他的消息了。

en: I feel like going to the movies.
I would rather go to the art museum than to the movie theater.
zh: 我宁愿去美术馆也不愿去电影院。

en: I suggested that we should go to the movies.
zh: 我建议我们应该去看电影。

en: I stayed home all day long instead of going to the movies.
zh: 我一整天都待在家里，没去看电影。

en: I'm a movie fan.
I like movies a lot.
I love movies.
I don't care for moving pictures.
I don't like movies.
I am fond of the cinema.
I like movies.
I am a member of the sales department.
I'm a salesman.
I want to fly above the clouds.
I flew above the clouds.
It was very lucky for me that I saw him.
zh: 我真幸运，竟然看到了他。

en: I am contented with my lot.
zh: 我对我的命运感到满意。

en: I was forced to submit to my fate.
I broke a bone in my foot while exercising.
zh: 我锻炼的时候脚骨折了。

en: Exercise is not in my line.
I was afraid I might fall asleep while driving.
zh: 我害怕开车的时候睡着。

en: I was afraid that I might fall asleep while driving.
zh: 我害怕开车的时候睡着。

en: I am not experienced in driving.
I had my fortune told.
I was lucky.
I'm above telling lies.
I always keep my promises.
I don't mind walking in the rain.
It doesn't bother me to walk in the rain.
I take a walk every day except when it rains.
zh: 我每天都散步，除非下雨。

en: I go for a walk every day, except when it rains.
zh: 我每天都去散步，除非下雨。

en: I was kept waiting in the rain for as long as ten minutes.
zh: 我在雨中等了足足十分钟。

en: I couldn't go on a picnic because of the rain.
zh: 因为下雨，我没能去野餐。

en: I went out in spite of the rain.
We put off our departure because of the rain.
zh: 因为下雨，我们推迟了出发。

en: I am aware that my hip aches when it rains.
zh: 我知道一下雨我的髋部就疼。

en: I reached school before the rain started.
zh: 我在下雨前赶到了学校。

en: I thought rain was beginning to fall.
I thought it had started to rain.
zh: 我以为已经开始下雨了。

en: I will go even if it rains.
I went out although it was raining.
zh: 虽然下着雨，我还是出去了。

en: I went out even though it was raining.
zh: 即使下着雨，我还是出去了。

en: I got my right leg injured.
I broke my right leg.
I am blind in the right eye.
I'm blind in the right eye.
I don't like drinking.
I was cured of my drinking habit.
I don't want anything to drink.
My mind was in a haze after drinking so much.
zh: 喝了这么多酒，我头脑一片混乱。

en: I have decided to retire.
I just moved.
I haven't heard of him since then.
zh: 从那以后我就没听说过他了。

en: I should have completed it before summer.
zh: 我应该在夏天之前完成它的。

en: I know a girl who can ride a unicycle.
zh: 我认识一个会骑独轮车的女孩。

en: I saw at a glance that he was an extraordinary man.
zh: 我一眼就看出他是个不平凡的人。

en: I recognized him at first glance.
I'm cleaned out.
I've run out of money.
I will accomplish my purpose step by step.
zh: 我会一步一个脚印地实现我的目标。

en: I saw a dog.
I got up early the next morning to catch the first train.
zh: 第二天早上我早早起床赶第一班火车。

en: I hurried to the station so as to be in time for the first train.
zh: 我赶紧去车站，以便赶上第一班火车。

en: I hurried in order to catch the first train.
zh: 我赶紧去赶第一班火车。

en: I got up early enough to catch the first train.
zh: 我起得很早，赶上了第一班火车。

en: I can't reach the top shelf.
I live on the bottom floor.
I was wearing my best clothes.
I had a good night's rest.
I mean students in general, but not in particular.
zh: 我指的是一般的学生，但不是特指。

en: I get up early in summer as a rule.
I was revived by a glass of water.
zh: 一杯水让我恢复了精神。

en: I was busy all day.
I'm very tired from working all day.
zh: 我工作了一整天，非常累。

en: I've worked all day, so that I am very tired.
zh: 我工作了一整天，所以我很累。

en: I spent the entire day on the beach.
zh: 我整个一天都待在海滩上。

en: I am free all day, I'll come and see you at any time that suits you.
zh: 我一整天都有空，我会在你方便的任何时候来看你。

en: I stayed home all day.
I have to use English all day.
I call on him every other day.
zh: 我每隔一天给他打电话。

en: I visit him every other day.
I take a bath every other day.
I have a bath every other day.
I go to the restaurant every 2 days.
I competed with him for the first prize.
I have never been to Kushiro.
I have never been to Europe.
I have never been to America.
I have visited Paris once.
I ran upstairs two steps at a time.
zh: 我一次跑两级台阶上楼。

en: I have seen her once in a TV drama.
zh: 我在电视剧里见过她一次。

en: I turned off the TV because I had seen the movie before.
zh: 因为之前看过这部电影，所以我把电视关了。

en: I wondered if I had ever really understood anyone.
zh: 我怀疑我是否真的了解过任何人。

en: I am studying very hard.
zh: 我正在非常努力地学习。

en: I have to bone up on my physics.
zh: 我必须临时抱佛脚，复习一下物理。

en: I am accustomed to working hard.
I worked hard all day, so I was very tired.
zh: 我工作了一整天，所以很累。

en: I studied very hard, only to fail the examination.
zh: 我非常努力地学习，结果还是考试不及格。

en: I have been his greatest fan all my life.
zh: 我一生都是他最忠实的粉丝。

en: I am accustomed to living alone.
I don't have any brothers.
I don't want to live by myself.
I don't want to live alone.
I met an old woman.
I like to travel alone.
There is absolutely no way that I would go on a trip alone.
zh: 我绝对不可能独自去旅行。

en: I can't bear living alone.
I walked in the woods by myself.
Do you think I should go alone?
zh: 你觉得我应该独自去吗？

en: Do you think I should go by myself?
zh: 你觉得我应该自己去吗？

en: I would rather not go shopping alone.
I don't want to go shopping by myself.
I can do it by myself.
I can do it by myself!
I was compelled to do the work alone.
zh: 我被迫独自完成这项工作。

en: I had to go there alone.
I made this kennel by myself.
I built this dog house all by myself.
zh: 我完全是自己建造了这个狗屋。

en: I built this doghouse by myself.
zh: 我自己建造了这个狗屋。

en: I don't like to be alone.
I like being alone.
I am an only child.
I'm an only child.
I was laughed out of court.
I saw her for a moment, but then lost sight of her in the crowd.
zh: 我看到她一会儿，但后来在人群中失去了她的踪影。

en: I saw her a week ago.
I can't go out, because I was injured a week ago in an accident.
zh: 我不能出去，因为我一周前在事故中受伤了。

en: I must return home within a week.
I go to the library two or three times a week.
zh: 我一周去图书馆两三次。

en: I have been here for a week.
zh: 我在这里待了一个星期了。

en: I've been here for a week.
zh: 我在这里待了一个星期了。

en: I studied for one hour.
I am paid 10 dollars an hour.
zh: 我每小时的工资是10美元。

en: I cannot get there in an hour.
zh: 我一个小时内到不了那里。

en: I can't get there in an hour.
zh: 我一个小时内到不了那里。

en: I looked for the book for an hour.
zh: 我找了那本书一个小时。

en: I watched the expedition as it set off.
I knew at a glance that he was an honest man.
zh: 我一眼就看出他是个诚实的人。

en: I am just a humble teacher.
I carried one bag, but the other one was left behind.
zh: 我拿了一个包，但另一个包被落下了。

en: I don't want to be tied to one company.
zh: 我不想被束缚在一家公司。

en: I have just one thing to ask of you.
I took a chance and accepted his challenge.
zh: 我冒险接受了他的挑战。

en: I hear Mr Inoue has put up at that hotel.
zh: 我听说井上先生住在那家旅馆。

en: I heard that Mr. Inoue has stayed at that hotel.
zh: 我听说井上先生住在那家旅馆。

en: I decided to make medicine my vocation.
I must send for the doctor.
I have complete faith in my doctor.
I regret not having taken my doctor's advice.
zh: 我后悔没有听从医生的建议。

en: The doctor's advice kept me from drinking too much.
zh: 医生的建议让我没有喝太多酒。

en: I went to see the doctor, only to find him absent.
zh: 我去看医生，结果他不在。

en: The doctor tells me not to touch alcohol.
zh: 医生告诉我不要碰酒精。

en: I must pay a visit to the doctor.
I was told that I should see a doctor.
zh: 有人告诉我应该去看医生。

en: I decided to be a doctor.
I decided to become a doctor.
I made up my mind to be a doctor.
zh: 我下定决心要当一名医生。

en: I wanted to become a doctor.
I wish to be a doctor.
I want to become a doctor.
I am not a doctor, but a teacher.
zh: 我不是医生，而是一名老师。

en: I'm not a doctor, but a teacher.
zh: 我不是医生，而是一名老师。

en: I'm a doctor.
I am a doctor.
I want to be a doctor or a nurse or a teacher.
zh: 我想当医生、护士或者老师。

en: I asked the doctor some questions.
I advise you in my capacity as a doctor to stop smoking.
zh: 我以医生的身份建议你戒烟。

en: I am majoring in medicine.
I shall will my money to a hospital.
zh: 我将把我的钱遗赠给一家医院。

en: I had a consultation with a lawyer about my will.
zh: 我咨询了律师关于我的遗嘱。

en: I am looking at the matter from a different viewpoint.
zh: 我正从不同的角度看待这件事。

en: It gradually dawned on me that I had taken the wrong train.
zh: 我逐渐意识到我坐错了火车。

en: I usually buy clothing at a local store.
zh: 我通常在当地商店买衣服。

en: I felt a sharp pain in the stomach.
I boldly jumped into the sea.
I married him against my will.
zh: 我违背自己的意愿嫁给了他。

en: I was compelled to do this against my will.
zh: 我被迫违背自己的意愿做了这件事。

en: I supported the committee's decision.
I am acquainted with the chairman of the committee.
I like all films that Juzo Itami directs.
zh: 我喜欢伊丹十三导演的所有电影。

en: I have climbed Mt. Fuji before.
I've climbed Mt. Fuji before.
I've lived in Kobe before.
I used to have an old Rolls Royce.
zh: 我以前有一辆旧劳斯莱斯。

en: I remember seeing you before.
I told you before that you should ask your mother first.
zh: 我以前就告诉过你，你应该先问问你妈妈。

en: I have visited Kyoto before.
I have more time, and less money than ever.
zh: 我比以往任何时候都有更多的时间，更少的钱。

en: I used to take a walk early in the morning.
I have seen a UFO before.
zh: 我以前见过不明飞行物。

en: I used to take a walk every morning.
zh: 我以前每天早上都散步。

en: I didn't use to like wine, but now I'm quite fond of it.
zh: 我以前不喜欢葡萄酒，但现在我很喜欢它。

en: I didn't use to like wine, but now I like it a lot.
zh: 我以前不喜欢葡萄酒，但现在我非常喜欢它。

en: I used to keep a diary.
I used to play badminton, but I don't anymore.
zh: 我以前打羽毛球，但现在不打了。

en: I was sure I had never seen her before.
zh: 我确信我以前从未见过她。

en: I've been to Sapporo before.
I had never been late for school before.
zh: 我以前上学从没迟到过。

en: I have seen the picture before.
I've seen the picture before.
I have read this book before.
I remember reading this novel before.
zh: 我记得以前读过这本小说。

en: I have a feeling that I have been here before.
zh: 我有一种感觉，我以前来过这里。

en: I have a feeling that I've been here before.
zh: 我有一种感觉，我以前来过这里。

en: I remember meeting you before.
I felt for the light switch in the dark.
zh: 我在黑暗中摸索着电灯开关。

en: I must get home before it gets dark.
zh: 我必须在天黑前赶回家。

en: I have to get home before it gets dark.
zh: 我必须在天黑前赶回家。

en: I don't like walking home alone after dark.
zh: 我不喜欢天黑后独自走回家。

en: I am looking for the chair in the dark.
I caught sight of Namie Amuro.
I admit having done wrong.
I climbed Mt. Aso.
I like Sachiko better than Akiko.
zh: 我更喜欢幸子而不是明子。

en: I was a naughty boy.

zh: 我和迈克在那家餐馆一起吃了午饭。

en: I know that Mike likes basketball.
Yesterday, I went to see Martha as I hadn't seen her for several months.
zh: 昨天，我去看望了玛莎，因为我已经好几个月没见到她了。

en: Since I hadn't seen Martha for several months, I went to visit her yesterday.
zh: 因为我已经好几个月没见到玛莎了，所以我昨天去拜访了她。

en: I missed the airplane by a minute.
zh: 我错过飞机就差一分钟。

en: I have only a little money about me.
I've had only a couple of drinks.
I've only had two or three drinks.
I clapped my hands.
I do like ice cream.
I saw a woman with hollow cheeks.
zh: 我看到一个脸颊凹陷的女人。

en: I asked for Bob's help.
I doubt if Bob will come to my birthday party.
zh: 我怀疑鲍勃会不会来参加我的生日派对。

en: I'd like to listen to pop music.
I am not satisfied with pop music.
I see the dog almost every day.
zh: 我几乎每天都看到那只狗。

en: I see that dog almost every day.
zh: 我几乎每天都看到那只狗。

en: I take a bath almost every day.
I get up at six almost every day.
I have little money with me.
I've eaten almost nothing.
I can hardly swim.
I got it for next to nothing.
zh: 我几乎没花钱就买到了。

en: I got that for almost nothing.
zh: 我几乎没花钱就买到了那个。

en: I am almost 180 centimeters tall.
I canceled my hotel reservations and stayed with friends.
zh: 我取消了酒店预订，和朋友们住在一起。

en: I canceled my hotel reservation.
I don't want to share the hotel room with a stranger.
zh: 我不希望和陌生人合住酒店房间。

en: I stayed at the hotel, but the others went shopping.
zh: 我住在酒店，但其他人去购物了。

en: I bought two bags of popcorn.
I feel I'm growing out of pop music.
zh: 我觉得我对流行音乐越来越没兴趣了。

en: I pressed the button to turn the radio on.
zh: 我按了按钮打开收音机。

en: I will give this book to whoever wants it.
zh: 谁想要这本书我就给谁。

en: I searched my pockets for the wallet.
I thrust my hand into my pocket.
I shoved my hands into my pockets.
I pocketed my keys.
I'm going to read some other books.
zh: 我打算读一些其他的书。

en: I plan to try reading some other books.
zh: 我计划尝试读一些其他的书。

en: I have something else to do.
I arrived ahead of the others.
I met the president himself.
I caught the ball with one hand.
I never want for a boyfriend.
I had the porter take my suitcases to my room.
zh: 我让搬运工把我的行李箱送到我的房间。

en: I saw a bellman coming along.
zh: 我看到一个行李员走过来。

en: I met a barking dog.
zh: 我遇到了一条吠叫的狗。

en: I have lost my pen.
I bought a pen, but I lost it.
zh: 我买了一支笔，但是我把它弄丢了。

en: I'm looking for my pen.
I bent over to pick up the pen.
I have a pen.
I must put my ideas together before I take up my pen.
zh: 我必须先整理好我的想法，然后才能拿起笔。

en: I have lost my pen. Will you help me look for it?
zh: 我把笔弄丢了。你能帮我找找吗？

en: I had lost my pen.
I sat waiting on a bench.
I sat waiting on the bench.
zh: 我坐在那条长凳上等待。

en: I proposed to Helen that we have a tea party.
zh: 我向海伦提议我们举办一个茶话会。

en: I'm Helen Cartwright's daughter.
zh: 我是海伦·卡特赖特的女儿。

en: I rang the bell and waited.
I rang the bell six times.
I had my suitcase carried to my room by a bellboy.
zh: 我让服务生把我的手提箱搬到我的房间。

en: I was roused by the sound of a bell.
I heard the bell ring.
I heard the sound of a ringing bell.
I shuddered at the sight of the snake.
I hid myself under the bed.
I hid under the bed.
I lay awake in bed.
I think Beethoven is as great a composer as ever lived.
zh: 我认为贝多芬是历史上最伟大的作曲家之一。

en: I think Beethoven is the greatest composer who ever lived.
zh: 我认为贝多芬是历史上最伟大的作曲家。

en: I like pro wrestling.
I have never gone to Florida.
zh: 我从来没去过佛罗里达。

en: I remember Fred visiting Kyoto with his mother.
zh: 我记得弗雷德和他妈妈一起去京都旅游。

en: I went to the department store with a view to buying a present.
zh: 我为了买礼物去了百货商店。

en: I like French food very much.
I'm employed by a French lawyer.
zh: 我受雇于一位法国律师。

en: I can speak French.
I want to study French.
I can't read French, nor can I speak it.
zh: 我既不会读法语，也不会说法语。

en: I don't know French.
I don't know French, much less Greek.
zh: 我不懂法语，更不用说希腊语了。

en: I am going to major in French.
I decided to major in French.
I can't speak French at all.
I don't know any French.
I want to learn French.
I am quite ignorant of French.
I can speak neither French nor German.
zh: 我既不会说法语，也不会说德语。

en: I am very interested in French.
I think it impossible for me to write a novel in French.
zh: 我认为我不可能用法语写小说。

en: I can't make myself understood in French.
zh: 我无法用法语表达清楚自己的意思。

en: I can't speak French.
I can't read French, let alone speak it.
zh: 我不会读法语，更别提说了。

en: I cannot read French.
I can't read French.
I love French films.
I love French movies.
I want to go over to France.
I got acquainted with her in France.
I met him at the end of the platform.
zh: 我在站台尽头遇见了他。

en: I like it black.
I belong to the brass band, and so does my brother.
zh: 我是铜管乐队的，我弟弟也是。

en: I belong to the brass band.
I come from Brazil.
I am from Brazil.
I respect Mr. Brown.
I am not as young as Miss Brown.
zh: 我没有布朗小姐那么年轻。

en: I pan-fried vegetables.
I long for a job as a flight attendant.
zh: 我渴望一份空乘的工作。

en: It struck me that the girl was trying to hide something.
zh: 我突然意识到那个女孩想隐瞒什么。

en: I quickly tried to get advice from him.
It occurred to me that the man was trying to cheat me out of my money.
zh: 我突然想到那个人想骗我的钱。

en: I played football.
I had my leg hurt while playing football.
zh: 我踢足球的时候腿受伤了。

en: I'm on the football team.
I usually keep a diary when I travel.
zh: 我旅行时通常会写日记。

en: I usually walk to school.
I don't usually have to work on Sundays.
zh: 我通常星期天不用工作。

en: I usually go to school by bicycle.
zh: 我通常骑自行车去学校。

en: I felt like swimming at the sight of the pool.
zh: 看到游泳池，我就想游泳。

en: I don't like to swim in the pool.
zh: 我不喜欢在游泳池里游泳。

en: I don't like swimming in pools.
zh: 我不喜欢在游泳池里游泳。

en: I don't like to swim in pools.
zh: 我不喜欢在游泳池里游泳。

en: I felt so refreshed after a swim in the pool.
zh: 在游泳池里游完泳后，我感到神清气爽。

en: I felt refreshed after a swim in the pool.
zh: 在游泳池里游完泳后，我感到神清气爽。

en: I bought a pair of boots.
I went swimming in the lake with Hiroko.
zh: 我和弘子一起去湖里游泳了。

en: I don't like Bill, who gets angry easily.
zh: 我不喜欢比尔，他很容易生气。

en: I found the building.
I learned that Bill's father was sick.
zh: 我得知比尔的父亲生病了。

en: I can run as fast as Bill.
zh: 我能跑得和比尔一样快。

en: I am good friends with Bill.
I have arranged for Bill to meet Ann tomorrow.
zh: 我已经安排比尔明天和安见面。

en: I poured the wine in a plastic bag and then dipped it in ice water.
zh: 我把酒倒进塑料袋里，然后浸在冰水里。

en: I like hot springs that are off the beaten track.
zh: 我喜欢那些人迹罕至的温泉。

en: I like onsen off the beaten track.
zh: 我喜欢人迹罕至的温泉。

en: I left the window open all through the night.
I am alone and feel I can write this to you.
zh: 我独自一人，觉得可以写这些给你。

en: I traveled by myself.
I'm afraid to go alone.
I cannot do the work on my own.
zh: 我不能独自完成这项工作。

en: I brought up two children alone.
zh: 我独自抚养了两个孩子。

en: I don't want to live all by myself.
I saw at a glance that he was an ordinary man.
zh: 我一眼就看出他是个普通人。

en: I am so tired that I can hardly walk.
zh: 我太累了，几乎走不动路。

en: I was too tired to stand.
zh: 我太累了，站都站不起来。

en: I was tired to death.
I stayed home because I had a bad cold.
zh: 我因为得了重感冒，所以待在家里。

en: Because I had a bad cold, I went to bed earlier than usual.
zh: 因为我得了重感冒，所以我比平时更早睡觉。

en: I'm suffering from a bad headache.
zh: 我正受着严重的头痛折磨。

en: I could not come because of the heavy rain.
I have the video.
I don't know how to use a VCR.
zh: 我不知道怎么用录像机。

en: I buy a videotape.
I pigged out on pizza.
I went to Victoria Station, where I saw an old friend of mine.
zh: 我去了维多利亚车站，在那里我看到了一个老朋友。

en: I like the works of Picasso.
I want to be a Picasso.
zh: 我想成为毕加索那样的人。

en: I never touch beer.
I don't care for beer.
I like green peppers very much.
I love green peppers.
I'd like to read some books about the Beatles.
zh: 我想读一些关于披头士乐队的书。

en: I like playing the piano.
I do not play the piano.
I play the piano.
I play piano.
I spent two hours playing the piano.
zh: 我花了两个小时弹钢琴。

en: I play the piano a little.
I like the sound of the piano.
I'm good at playing the piano.
I can't play the piano, but she can.
zh: 我不会弹钢琴，但是她会。

en: I want to be a pianist.
I bought a loaf of bread at the baker's.
zh: 我在面包店买了一条面包。

en: I prefer rice to bread.
zh: 比起面包，我更喜欢米饭。

en: I'm a baker.
I bought bread, coffee, sugar and the like.
zh: 我买了面包、咖啡、糖之类的东西。

en: I keep my hammer in the toolbox.
zh: 我把锤子放在工具箱里。

en: I glanced through the brochure.
I ate a hamburger and ordered another.
zh: 我吃了一个汉堡，又点了一个。

en: I wanted a hamburger, but I restrained myself.
zh: 我想吃汉堡，但我克制住了自己。

en: I was robbed of my purse.
Am I handsome or not?
I'm going to Hawaii by ship.
I'll go to Hawaii by ship.
I wish to go to Hawaii.
I am fascinated not so much by ballet itself as by the way the human body moves.
zh: 我着迷的与其说是芭蕾本身，不如说是人体运动的方式。

en: I was in a good position to see the parade.
zh: 我处在一个观看游行的好位置。

en: I took a train bound for Paris.
zh: 我乘坐一列开往巴黎的火车。

en: I went to London by way of Paris.
I booked through to Paris.
zh: 我预订了直达巴黎的车票。

en: I am to go to Paris.
The longer I stayed in Paris, the more I liked it.
zh: 我在巴黎待得越久，就越喜欢它。

en: I have been in Paris.
I like flowers such as roses and lilies.
zh: 我喜欢像玫瑰和百合这样的花。

en: I bought flowers - roses, lilies, and so on.
zh: 我买了花——玫瑰、百合等等。

en: I have been waiting for the results with anxiety.
zh: 我一直焦虑地等待结果。

en: I have a bat and ball.
zh: 我有一个球棒和一个球。

en: I didn't know hummingbirds could even fly upside down when frightened.
zh: 我不知道蜂鸟在受到惊吓时甚至可以倒着飞。

en: I bought butter, cheese, eggs and what not.
zh: 我买了黄油、奶酪、鸡蛋等等。

en: I have to make money to buy a personal computer.
zh: 我必须挣钱买一台个人电脑。

en: I had my personal computer repaired.
zh: 我把我的个人电脑修理好了。

en: I have got a personal computer.
I want a personal computer.
I want a computer.
I got off at the bus stop and went to the right.
zh: 我在公共汽车站下了车，然后向右走。

en: I would rather go on foot than stay here waiting for the bus.
zh: 我宁愿步行也不愿留在这里等公共汽车。

en: I'm waiting for the bus.
I saw him cross the street as I got off the bus.
zh: 我下车时看到他穿过马路。

en: It was not until I got off the bus that I realized I had left my umbrella.
zh: 直到我下了公共汽车，我才意识到我把伞落下了。

en: I cannot drive a bus.
I can't drive a bus.
I love to spend time trying to put together a puzzle.
I like trains better than buses.
zh: 比起公共汽车，我更喜欢火车。

en: I ran for the bus and was already breathless.
zh: 我跑着去赶公共汽车，已经气喘吁吁了。

en: I must renew my passport.
I need to renew my passport.
I have to renew my passport.
I may have left my wallet on the bus.
zh: 我可能把钱包落在公共汽车上了。

en: I have left my umbrella in a bus.
zh: 我把伞落在公共汽车上了。

en: I left my umbrella on the bus.
zh: 我把伞落在公交车上了。

en: I had my purse stolen in the bus.
zh: 我在公交车上钱包被偷了。

en: I had my wallet stolen on the bus.
zh: 我在公交车上钱包被偷了。

en: I sat in the front of the bus.
I feared that I might be late for the bus.
I was afraid that I might be late for the bus.
I was afraid I might be late for the bus.
I go to Osaka by bus.
I don't go to school by bus.
I love watching basketball.
I like volleyball as well as basketball.
I waited for a bus to come.
I caught a glimpse of him from the bus.
zh: 我在公交车上瞥见了他。

en: I'm sticking to my original plan.
I visited Kushiro for the first time.
I went up to the roof by means of a ladder.
zh: 我通过梯子爬到了屋顶。

en: I filled the pail with water.
I poured water into the bucket.
They were making a fool of me.
I sat smoking a pipe.
I've run up against all kinds of people, working as a temporary.
zh: 我做临时工，遇到了各种各样的人。

en: I cannot drive a motorcycle, much less a car.
zh: 我不会骑摩托车，更别说开车了。

en: I went hiking with the group.
zh: 我和团队一起去徒步旅行。

en: I went hiking.
I met a group of hikers, some of whom were university students.
zh: 我遇到了一群徒步旅行者，其中一些是大学生。

en: I play the violin.
I play violin.
I can't play the guitar, much less the violin.
zh: 我不会弹吉他，更别说拉小提琴了。

en: I am absorbed in growing herbs and your Web pages are a great help to me.
zh: 我沉迷于种植草药，你的网页对我有很大的帮助。

en: I introduced two of my friends at the party.
zh: 我在聚会上介绍了我的两个朋友。

en: I got acquainted with my wife at a party.
zh: 我在聚会上认识了我的妻子。

en: I put on my favorite dress for the party.
zh: 我穿上了我最喜欢的裙子去参加聚会。

en: I was invited to the party.
I'm not going to go to the party.
I was at the party.
I very much like going to parties and meeting people.
zh: 我非常喜欢参加聚会和认识人。

en: I was prevailed upon to go to the party.
zh: 我被说服去参加了聚会。

en: I promised to go to the party with Jane, and I can't let her down.
zh: 我答应和简一起去参加聚会，我不能让她失望。

en: I bought a pendant to wear to the party.
zh: 我买了一个吊坠去参加聚会。

en: I saw her at the party.
I hoped to have met him at the party.
zh: 我希望在聚会上见过他。

en: I had a good time at the party.
zh: 我在聚会上玩得很开心。

en: I ran across some old friends at the party.
zh: 我在聚会上碰到了几个老朋友。

en: I cleaned up after the party.
I stuck two sheets of paper together with paste.
zh: 我用浆糊把两张纸粘在一起。

en: As I opened the door without knocking, she lost her temper.
zh: 我没敲门就打开了门，她发脾气了。

en: I mistook a notebook for a textbook.
zh: 我把笔记本错当成了教科书。

en: He wrote it down in his notebook.
zh: 他把它记在了笔记本上。

en: I want a notebook.
I need pens, notebooks and so on.
